articles.title: Babar or Kohli? Who partners Gill? Wisden’s writers pick a current men’s ODI world XI - Wisden
articles.description: Ahead of the 2023 Cricket World Cup, Wisden writers have picked their men's ODI World XI. Find out who made the cut here.
articles.content:
On the eve of the 2023 Cricket World Cup, Wisden writers have picked their current men’s ODI world XI – here’s who made the cut.

articles.title: Manchester United investigating how Galatasaray fans had Old Trafford home tickets - The Athletic
articles.description:
Manchester United are investigating after a number of Galatasaray fans appeared to have tickets in the home section of Old Trafford during their Champions League game on Tuesday.
The Turkish side were surprise 3-2 winners in Manchester but during and after th…

articles.author: Oriol Puigdemont
articles.title: Marc Marquez will leave Honda MotoGP team for Gresini Ducati - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Marc Marquez will race for Gresini Ducati in MotoGP next year after Honda announced on Wednesday the eight-time world champion will leave the Japanese manufacturer at the end of 2023.
articles.content: By mutual agreement, Marquez and Honda will break one of the most fruitful alliances in the history of MotoGP, which has yielded a total of six world titles over eleven seasons between 2013 and 2023.… [+3848 chars]
